title: September 2023 Releases
description: Conda 23.9.0, conda-build 3.27.0, conda-libmamba-solver 23.9.0/23.9.1, conda-index 0.3.0, and pycosat 0.6.5/0.6.6 have been released! 🎉

title: Conda Newsletter, Issue #2
description: Upcoming Events, conda-store brief, Is conda free?, pre and post plugin hooks, Recent releases, Travis Hathaway's latest talk on Youtube.

title: Is conda free?
description: Answers the frequently asked questions about what's free (almost everything), what parts of the ecosystem may not be free, and under what (clearly defined) conditions those "maybe-not-free" parts are free after all.

title: New pre and post command plugin hooks
description:
The latest release of conda introduces two new plugin hooks: pre and post command. These hooks allow plugin
authors to execute code before and after any conda command. Learn more about how and why you would use
these in this post.

title: July 2023 Releases for conda and conda-build
description: Conda 23.7.0, 23.7.1, 23.7.2, and conda-build 3.26.0 have been released! 🎉
